runs.comm: fullish and outside the off, decent pace as well, slanting away from the left-handed Smith, played at and missed, through to the keeper
short of a good length and outside the off stump, played down to third-man with an angled bat
short of a good length and outside the off stump, left well alone to the keeper
short of a driving length and outside the off, again left alone, not often you see two balls in a row being left alone in this form of the game
short, a bit too wide and that disappears. Duminy has enough of leaving the ball alone and carves this one through point, cracking shot
teasing line and length outside the off, poked at and missed, through to the keeper
fullish and outside the off, plenty of swing for Rasel, driven to point
short of a length this time and consequently hardly any swing, driven down to point, straight to the fielder
fuller once again and on the off, a hint of away swing ensures the batsman doesn't take a chance and just plays back down the pitch
just a little too wide and not full enough for the ball to really swing, Smith swings through the line and times the ball really well through cover. Solid shot.
full and on the stumps this time, Smith shuffles across and defends towards off
Smith backs away and tries to drive through the off side, the ball swings just a bit and the bat comes down in time to push the ball to point
short of a good length and on the off, defended back down the pitch
short of a length once more and outside the off, Duminy goes back and punches but finds the fielder at cover
full and outside the off stump, Duminy flashes at it, the ball goes off a thick outside edge down to third-man
down the pitch and flayed through cover. That is a powerful blow, brutally struck. Smith comes down the track and just muscles the ball to the fence
again Smith takes a couple of steps down the pitch. This time the ball is short. Cut to point
again down the pitch, again Smith hits the cover off the ball. This time the ball is full and straight and Smith hammers to long-on. That is a very strong hit
short of a good length and on the off, Dumniny drives off the back foot but only manages an inside edge onto the pads, a single is pinched
short of a good length and outside the off, driven to cover with an angled bat
Smith moves across his stumps this time, Rasel sends the ball in full and outside the off and gets some swing, beaten, good take from the keeper standing up
this time Smtih backs right away to leg and slashes the ball over point, a couple of bounces and over the ropes
slogged across the line, it'll just be the single as midwicket fields
very full and on the pads, there's no fine-leg and Duminy cleverly just dabs the ball around the corner. Delicate lap-sweep and it's four all the way
low full-toss on the off, Smith drives very hard but not past the man at mid-off, single scampered as the throw comes in
short of a good length and outside the off, big heave over midwicket, no contact at all, the ball goes safely through to the keeper
short of a good length and on the pads, clipped to the leg side where there are plenty of gaps
short of a good length and outside the off, cut hard but once again to the fielder, at point
short of a length and outside the off, Duminy drags this one through midwicket but doesn't quite get hold of the ball. It still has enough legs on it to reach the boundary
back of a length and on the off, worked to the on side
short of a good length and on the off, driven to short cover
short of a length and outside the off, pulled down to the on side, no real timing though and it's just a single
fullish and outside the off, Smith goes for a big hit over the off side, long-off thinks extra-cover will take this one. Seems extra-cover thinks it's not his catch either. The ball lands safely.
short of a length and outside the off, pulled through midwicket
short of a length and outside the off, cut to point
big swing and a miss, through to the keeper, South Africa 42 for no loss as the fielding restrictions are lifted
flat and quite quick, on the off, worked to the leg side
slightly short and Smith pounces on it, pulling hard to the on-side sweeper
worked away through on for another single
full and straight, Smith tries to launch the ball over the leg side and misses, struck on the pad, loud shout for the lbw, looks very very close but the umpire thinks not
another whack through the leg side for a couple
full and outside the off, eased through cover to end the over
full and outside the off, driven inside out to cover
flat and on the off, stroked down to long-off for a single that brings up South Africa's 50
big reverse sweep played, missed, through to the keeper
more conventional shot, more successful as well, the off drive down to long-off for a single
hit straight back down the ground and hit very hard, that one beats the bowler and races away for four, very straight. Sweetly struck
single eased into the off side and South Africa are coasting here
short of a length and on the pads, heaved over the infield to the on side
swept hard and past the man at short fine-leg, there is cover though
Duminy comes down the pitch and finds the ball is a bit short. Duminy slaps that cross-batted for a six over long-on

Gone! Duminy slog-sweeps out of habit, not really looking at the line and length of the ball. He's beaten in the flight and struck on the pad. This time his luck has run out as the umpire's finger goes up
flat and straight, on the stumps, worked top the on side
full and outside the off, placed just wide of cover for a single
tossed up and outside the off, juicy half-volley, off driven powerfully back down the ground and long-off has no chance
slightly shorter, outside the off, flat-batted through cover
full, flat and strraight, fired in on the pads, defended back down the pitch
down the leg side, flick played and missed
full and on the off, driven back to the bowler
eased through cover for a single
short of a length, outside the off, hit wide of extra-cover for a single to end the over
full-pitched, on the middle, swiped through the on side
full and around the off stump, pushed to cover
full and outside off, leans forward and swings it over midwicket
on a length, on the middle and leg, going on with the angle, Albie is cramped-up a touch, adjusts to work it to wide midwicket
drifting towards middle and leg, flicked past square leg
length delivery outside off stump, flat-batted to long-off
drifting on to the pads, turned to backward square leg
slow through the air, spins in from outside off, slightly short in length, chopped to backward point
fuller, turns in from off stump line, defended to the off side
on the middle and leg, worked with the turn to right of midwicket
slow through the air, on the off stump line, spins in, Smith shuffles across, gets outside the line and paddles it to square leg
Bosh! Tossed-up, outside off stump, Albie goes down on his front knee and swings it high and over deep midwicket.
full, slanting across Smith who whacks it straight down the ground. Powerfully hit and the long-off has no chance of preventing that one.
medium-pace, around the off stump, full, driven to long-off
full again, on the off stump line, carved to long-off
almost decapitated the bowler. Full, straight and hit hard back at chest-high at Reza who palms it away.
Full again, low dipping full toss, the front foot goes outside the line, outside the leg stump and the bat swings through nicely and cleanly to send the ball racing through midwicket
on the stumps, turned to deep backward square leg
slightly short, on the middle stump line, pulled uppishly towards deep midwicket
charges down the track, Shakib pushes it further outside off stump, Smith reaches out and carves it through cover
loopy flighted delivery on the stumps, Smith top edges a sweep and Rahim, the wicketkeeper, runs towards square leg to get under it.
quicker, short of length, outside off stump, beaten while trying to cut it
full, on the middle stump line, driven past the diving bowler to long-on
full, on the middle stump line, swatted to square leg
full and straight, driven down the track
faster, fuller, on the middle and off stump line, pushed to cover
short and spinning towards the leg stump, pulled over deep midwicket. he made that look easy
slightly short ,outside off, cut to deep point
full, on the off stump line, not much turn, driven to extra cover
low dipping full toss, on the middle and leg, it dips rapidly on Albie who lunges forward and works it to midwicket region
arm-ball, on the middle stump line, wristed to left of midwicket
charges down the track, reaches the pitch and drills it to long-on
outside the off stump, de Villiers tries to force it through point but misses it completely
comes in with the arm, pushed back to the bowler
Albie falls. Bangladesh continue to fight. He comes down the track and mistimes a lofted shot, straight to long-off. He ended up slicing it off the bottom of the bat
drifts in from round the stumps, lands on the off stump and spins past the bat.
similar delivery, another drive attempted and this time he gets a outside edge to short third man
short delivery, cut to deep point
fuller, quicker, on the off stump, jabbed to cover
nice. slower this time, lands on the leg and middle, turns towards middle, Kemp was expecting a quicker one and just nudges this to the on side. Good tight over comes to an end.
fuller, outside the off stump, square driven to deep point
from round the stumps, drifting on straight towards middle and off, pushed to the cover and they rush across for a quick single
walks right across the sticks, the ball was pushed further outside off stump and de Villiers adjusts by opening the bat-face and pushes it through backward point. Very well placed
moves outside leg, then walks right back in line and works a full delivery past square leg
Kemp frees his arms. Floated outside off, full, drilled to the left of long-off where Tamim Iqbal throws himself to his left but can only watch the ball fly past his outstretched hand
from round the stumps, full and on the leg and middle, almost yorker length, worked past square leg
another one, full and on that leg and middle line - from round the stumps- dug out past square leg
lands outside leg stump, on a length, moves in towards leg and middle, stays back to whip it past square leg
full, on that leg and middle again, de Villiers drives to long-on for a single. 5 to win from 8 balls.
On a drivable length, on that leg and middle again, but Kemp is ready for that this time, clears the front foot and drills it high over wide long-on. Game over.
